trait.name: Cunning Action
entries: On each of its turns, the trickster can use a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

trait.name: Evasion
entries: If the trickster is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, the trickster instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries: The trickster deals an extra 14 ({@dice 4d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the trickster that isn't incapacitated and the trickster doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Dagger
entries: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 5 ({@damage 1d4    +    3}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Uncanny Dodge
entries: The trickster halves the damage that it takes from an attack that hits it. The trickster must be able to see the attacker.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The trickster is a 3rd-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 13, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following wizard spells prepared:
